verify.name: Verify acpid service status
verify.hint: The acpid service should be running. Please check the status of the service using the `systemctl status acpid` command.

steps.title: Configure acpid to Monitor Power Events

verify.name: Verify lid-close event handler
verify.hint: The lid-close event handler should log a message to the system log when the laptop lid is closed. Please check the /var/log/syslog file for the expected log message.

verify.name: Verify low-battery event handler
verify.hint: The low-battery event handler should log a message to the system log when the battery level drops below 20%. Please check the /var/log/syslog file for the expected log message.
